Package com.example.untoldpsproject.controllers

Class CategoryController

java.lang.Object
com.example.untoldpsproject.controllers.CategoryController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/category") public class CategoryController extends Object
Controller class for managing category operations.

  • Method Details

    • categoryList

      @GetMapping("/list") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView categoryList()
      Retrieves a list of categories and displays them.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView object containing the view name and the list of categories.

    • addCategoryForm

      @GetMapping("/add") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addCategoryForm()
      Displays the form for adding a new category.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView object containing the view name and an empty CategoryDto object.

    • addCategory

      @PostMapping("/add") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addCategory(@ModelAttribute CategoryDto categoryDto)
      Adds a new category.
      Parameters:
      categoryDto - The CategoryDto object representing the category to be added.
      Returns:
      A redirection to the category list view.

    • editCategoryForm

      @GetMapping("/edit/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView editCategoryForm(@PathVariable("id") String categoryId)
      Displays the form for editing an existing category.
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category to be edited.
      Returns:
      A ModelAndView object containing the view name and the CategoryDto object to be edited.

    • updateCategory

      @PostMapping("/edit/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateCategory(@ModelAttribute("categoryDto") CategoryDto categoryDto)
      Updates an existing category.
      Parameters:
      categoryDto - The CategoryDto object representing the updated category information.
      Returns:
      A redirection to the category list view.

    • deleteCategory

      @GetMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteCategory(@PathVariable("id") String id)
      Deletes a category.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A redirection to the category list view.
